member.name: D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.Caps
member.summary: Instruction predication is supported if this value is nonzero. See setp_comp - vs.

member.name: D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.DynamicFlowControlDepth
member.summary: Either 0 or 24, which represents the depth of the dynamic flow control instruction nesting. See D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.

member.name: D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.NumTemps
member.summary: The number of temporary registers supported. See D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.

member.name: D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.StaticFlowControlDepth
member.summary: The depth of nesting of the loop - vs/rep - vs and call - vs/callnz bool - vs instructions. See D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.

member.name: D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.NumInstructionSlots
member.summary: The number of instruction slots supported. See D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0.
